replies.body:
{{champion:16}} Mmm..whoever thought of adding ice cream on top of a banana is a genius. How is the testing going? 

{{champion:53}} **Questions have concluded and results have been processed. Found 3 choices.** 

{{champion:16}} Well that's great. What are his choices?

{{champion:53}} **Option 1: Imaginary friend Bob. Option 2: This hanging noose. Option 3: Amumu **

{{champion:6}} Each option is worst than the last. Especially that last one. _sigh_ Maybe I should go with the second option. 

{{champion:16}} Urgot don't think like that. Life is a precious thing and shouldn't be given up so easily. 

{{champion:6}} You do know I was dead, only to be brought back to semi-life right? 

{{champion:16}} Wait...you weren't born this way? 

{{champion:6}} ....WHO THE HELL WOULD BE BORN THIS WAY!!!? 

{{champion:16}} I don't know! I'm still learning this world. Did you know there are people out there who are half-animal? 

{{champion:6}} You are half-animal. 

{{champion:16}} No I'm not. I'm a  celestial being. Big difference. 

{{champion:6}} Ok so what do half-animal people have to do with me? 

{{champion:16}} Well seeing as how some people here are born half-animal, I thought there where other people born half-machine. 

{{champion:6}} ....If I could I would face-palm. 

{{champion:16}} Wait...people here can turn their faces into hands!? 

{{champion:53}} **Observation: Naive. **
When Will the Skt skins be available tho?

Probably after this Vs. Missions are over. 

Soo...Tuesday I am guessing...
i want the ward skin so badly!
Yall just wait. Summer is coming up and you know what that means. Time for some pool party {{champion:103}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:37}}
That Soraka skin makes me so sad. It reminds me of the old Starcall and how you could actually play her midlane.
zed or talon? or nothing? whats better ?
lol, just discovered i'm an {{champion:2}} 1-trick. time to get a skin...
